Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Lavergne
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Laramie, Harrison, Cicero and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Laramie, Harrison, Cicero and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Lavergne.

Allow extra travel time.
